MC2String FileUtils::Directory::getNextFilename (   ) 
 

Returns:
next filename in directory and advance file pointer to next filename. If filename is empty then directory reached end.

bool FileUtils::Directory::open (  const MC2String &  directory  ) 
 

Open a new directory, this will close the current directory.

Parameters:
directory The name of the directory to open.
Returns:
true on success and current directory name is changed, on failure it will return false and the currently opened directory will stay open.

Rewind file pointer to begining of directory.

void FileUtils::Directory::scan (  Filenames &  filenames,
const Filter &  filter
)  const
 

Scan directory for filenames and filter out files.

Parameters:
filenames Returns the set of files not filtered out.
filter Determines which files to include in the result.
